name: (Time) Crystals
description:
With the passing of time, there is no certainty other than change.

What we once considered solid is either rotten to dust or molten away. If we live grieving the past, tears will blur the beauty that is happening right before our eyes, here and now.

This piece is both a celebration and a thank you. A celebration of time passing and bringing with it new opportunities and tomorrows. A thank you for everyone who shared a step with me. Be it phisically or virtually. There's no profound meaning in anything other than the people we meet and experiences we share. 


1080*1350 mp4. Crystals animated with gometry nodes. 100% Blender
